## Player.resize() method

Resizes the player container element and everything within it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resize(newSize: ContainerSize): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

newSize


</td><td>

[ContainerSize](./player.containersize.md)


</td><td>

new size of the player


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Use this method when the player itself does not detect properly the change in size of its container element. It can be a case for orientation change on some mobile devices.
